publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2610 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Sickness Record at West Dunbartonshire Council-That the Parliament acknowledges the recent report by West Dunbartonshire Council regarding the absence and sickness record of staff there which reached 30,000 days lost in the first two quarters of 2000-01 and recommends a full investigation into low staff morale and the council's management.
S1M-2610 Sickness Record at West Dunbartonshire Council (lodged on 15 January 2002) Tommy Sheridan*, Colin Campbell*
S1M-2610 Sickness Record at West Dunbartonshire Council (lodged on 15 January 2002) Alex Neil*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-2610 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Sickness Record at West Dunbartonshire Council-That the Parliament acknowledges the recent report by West Dunbartonshire Council regarding the absence and sickness record of staff there which reached 30,000 days lost in the first two quarters of 2000-01 and recommends a full investigation into low staff morale and the council's management. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Colin Campbell, Alex Neil, Ms Sandra White
S1M-2610 Sickness Record at West Dunbartonshire Council (lodged on 15 January 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
